quote: I always have it a point to always call the listing agent before you even submit an offer because without that relationship, they don't know who you are.
why_clipworthy: This moment highlights a specific tactic that can help agents improve their offer acceptance rate.
suggested_hook: Want to make your offers stand out? Here's a simple tactic that can make all the difference.

quote: If you cannot hire a TC now, there is very little chance of you being able to scale.
why_clipworthy: This challenges the common belief that only high-producing agents need a transaction coordinator.
suggested_hook: Think you can't afford a transaction coordinator? Think again.
